sentences.en: a UN agency responsible for helping refugees
sentences.cn: 负责为难民提供帮助的联合国机构

sentences.en: Agency France Presse enjoys great popularity both at home and abroad.
sentences.cn: 法新社在国内外都很有名气.

sentences.en: Anne chose an upmarket agency aimed at professional people.
sentences.cn: 安妮选择了一家以专业人士为服务对象的高端代理商。

sentences.en: Biggart Donald, the Glasgow-based marketing agency, has won two Edinburgh accounts.
sentences.cn: 比加特·唐纳德，这家驻格拉斯哥的营销代理公司已赢得了两个爱丁堡的客户。

sentences.en: He was placed in Xin Hua News Agency as a translator.
sentences.cn: 他被安排在新华通讯社当翻译.

sentences.en: His agency hires out security guards and bodyguards.
sentences.cn: 他这家中介公司有保安和保镖可供雇用。

sentences.en: I was headhunted by a marketing agency.
sentences.cn: 我被一家销售代理公司物色上了。

sentences.en: I've been temping for an employment agency.
sentences.cn: 我一直在一家职业介绍所做临时工。

sentences.en: Our agency is a one-stop shop for all your travel needs.
sentences.cn: 我社是您旅游方面的综合服务站。

sentences.en: The advertising agency rang up 1.4 billion dollars in yearly sales.
sentences.cn: 这家广告代理商每年销售额达14亿美元。
代理处为客户开具发票。

sentences.en: The agency says international relief agencies also have pitched in.
sentences.cn: 该机构说国际救援机构也提供了支援。

sentences.en: The agency was heavily criticised for its tardy response to the hurricane.
sentences.cn: 该机构因对飓风反应迟缓，受到严厉批评。

sentences.en: The agency will pay you a monthly retainer.
sentences.cn: 这个机构将会每月付给你聘用金。

sentences.en: They even set up their own news agency to peddle anti-isolationist propaganda.
sentences.cn: 他们甚至设立了自己的通讯社来宣扬反孤立主义。

sentences.en: They traced the van to a New Jersey car rental agency.
sentences.cn: 他们查出面包车属于新泽西州的一家租车行。

sentences.en: We had to hire maids through an agency.
sentences.cn: 我们得通过代理公司雇用女佣。

words.tran_cn: 代理人，代理商；药剂；特工

phrases.tran_cn: 保险代理机构；保险代理行；保险代理公司
船舶代理；船舶代理公司；航运公司

trans.tran_cn: 服务/代理/经销机构，（政府）专门机构
trans.tran_en: a business that provides a particular service for people or organizations
